title: Ward Indicators Clarity
body:
So Riot recently added small indicators above wards so you could tell which is which. Problem is, the indicators for {{item:2044}} and {{item:3340}} look exactly the same to me. One is green, and one is yellow, so they look exactly the same to me at a glance, especially because they are both circles. Sure one may have an extra ring around it but how could I notice that with the half a second I have to see it?

My suggestion for the small ward indicators is to change the shape of them instead of simply adding a ring around it. Make them a triangle or a diamond and I would be able to tell the difference.

replies.body:
Warding Totem should be yellow, though I still trust that they look the same to you.

I'll bring up the suggestion; I think changing shape is a good idea.
Yeah yellow, don't know why I said blue, still look very similar though :p
Could you add a barely visible circle of light around the wards so we know how far they reveal? Similar to Morgana's ult.
Maybe something's wrong with one of our clients, but for me the green circle is almost twice as big as the yellow circle.
They should be the same circle, but one just has an extra ring around it
